\documentclass[english]{article}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[latin9]{inputenc}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{cancel}

\makeatletter

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% LyX specific LaTeX commands.
%% Because html converters don't know tabularnewline
\providecommand{\tabularnewline}{\\}

\makeatother

\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}
\[
x=\dfrac{x'-\beta w'}{\sqrt{1-\beta^{2}}}
\]
\[
\begin{array}{ccccccc}
x'_{A} & = & \dfrac{x_{A}-\beta w_{A}}{\sqrt{1-\beta^{2}}} & \qquad & w'_{A} & = & \dfrac{w_{A}-\beta x_{A}}{\sqrt{1-\beta^{2}}}\\
 & = & \dfrac{3-\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)\left(4\right)}{\sqrt{1-\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)^{2}}} &  &  & = & \dfrac{4-\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)\left(3\right)}{\sqrt{1-\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)^{2}}}\\
 & = & \dfrac{1}{\dfrac{\sqrt{3}}{2}} &  &  & = & \dfrac{\dfrac{5}{2}}{\dfrac{\sqrt{3}}{2}}\\
 & = & \dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}} &  &  & = & \dfrac{5}{\sqrt{3}}\\
 & \approx & 1,15 &  &  & \approx & 2,89
\end{array}
\]
\[
\begin{array}{ccccccc}
x'_{B} & = & \dfrac{x_{B}-\beta w_{B}}{\sqrt{1-\beta^{2}}} & \qquad & w'_{B} & = & \dfrac{w_{B}-\beta x_{B}}{\sqrt{1-\beta^{2}}}\\
 & = & \dfrac{4-\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)\left(4\right)}{\sqrt{1-\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)^{2}}} &  &  & = & \dfrac{4-\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)\left(4\right)}{\sqrt{1-\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)^{2}}}\\
 & = & \dfrac{2}{\dfrac{\sqrt{3}}{2}} &  &  & = & \dfrac{\dfrac{4}{2}}{\dfrac{\sqrt{3}}{2}}\\
 & = & \dfrac{4}{\sqrt{3}} &  &  & = & \dfrac{4}{\sqrt{3}}\\
 & \approx & 2,31 &  &  & \approx & 2,31
\end{array}
\]

Ponto A\_s' em S

\[
\begin{array}{ccccccc}
\left(x'_{A}\right)_{x} & = & \dfrac{x'_{A}+\beta\cancelto{0}{w'_{A}}}{\sqrt{1-\beta^{2}}} & \qquad & \left(x'_{A}\right)_{w} & = & \dfrac{\cancelto{0}{w'_{A}}+\beta x'_{A}}{\sqrt{1-\beta^{2}}}\\
 & = & \dfrac{\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}}{\sqrt{1-\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)^{2}}} &  &  & = & \dfrac{\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)\left(\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\right)}{\sqrt{1-\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)^{2}}}\\
 & = & \dfrac{\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}}{\dfrac{\sqrt{3}}{2}} &  &  & = & \dfrac{\dfrac{1}{\sqrt{3}}}{\dfrac{\sqrt{3}}{2}}\\
 & = & \dfrac{4}{3} &  &  & = & \dfrac{2}{3}\\
 & \approx & 1,33 &  &  & \approx & 0,67
\end{array}
\]

\[
\begin{array}{ccccccc}
\left(w'_{A}\right)_{x} & = & \dfrac{w'_{A}+\cancelto{0}{\beta x'_{A}}}{\sqrt{1-\beta^{2}}} & \qquad & \left(w'_{A}\right)_{w} & = & \dfrac{\cancelto{0}{w'_{A}}+\beta x'_{A}}{\sqrt{1-\beta^{2}}}\\
 & = & \dfrac{\dfrac{5}{\sqrt{3}}}{\sqrt{1-\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)^{2}}} &  &  & = & \dfrac{\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)\left(\dfrac{5}{\sqrt{3}}\right)}{\sqrt{1-\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)^{2}}}\\
 & = & \dfrac{\dfrac{5}{\sqrt{3}}}{\dfrac{\sqrt{3}}{2}} &  &  & = & \dfrac{\dfrac{5}{2\sqrt{3}}}{\dfrac{\sqrt{3}}{2}}\\
 & = & \dfrac{10}{3} &  &  & = & \dfrac{5}{3}\\
 & \approx & 3,33 &  &  & \approx & 1,67
\end{array}
\]

Ponto B

\[
\begin{array}{ccccccc}
\left(x'_{B}\right)_{x} & = & \dfrac{x'_{B}+\beta\cancelto{0}{w'_{B}}}{\sqrt{1-\beta^{2}}} & \qquad & \left(x'_{B}\right)_{w} & = & \dfrac{\cancelto{0}{w'_{B}}+\beta x'_{B}}{\sqrt{1-\beta^{2}}}\\
 & = & \dfrac{\dfrac{4}{\sqrt{3}}}{\sqrt{1-\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)^{2}}} &  &  & = & \dfrac{\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)\left(\dfrac{4}{\sqrt{3}}\right)}{\sqrt{1-\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)^{2}}}\\
 & = & \dfrac{\dfrac{4}{\sqrt{3}}}{\dfrac{\sqrt{3}}{2}} &  &  & = & \dfrac{\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}}{\dfrac{\sqrt{3}}{2}}\\
 & = & \dfrac{8}{3} &  &  & = & \dfrac{4}{3}\\
 & \approx & 2,67 &  &  & \approx & 1,33
\end{array}
\]

\[
\begin{array}{ccccccc}
\left(w'_{A}\right)_{x} & = & \dfrac{w'_{A}+\cancelto{0}{\beta x'_{A}}}{\sqrt{1-\beta^{2}}} & \qquad & \left(w'_{A}\right)_{w} & = & \dfrac{\cancelto{0}{w'_{A}}+\beta x'_{A}}{\sqrt{1-\beta^{2}}}\\
 & = & \dfrac{\dfrac{5}{\sqrt{3}}}{\sqrt{1-\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)^{2}}} &  &  & = & \dfrac{\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)\left(\dfrac{5}{\sqrt{3}}\right)}{\sqrt{1-\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)^{2}}}\\
 & = & \dfrac{\dfrac{5}{\sqrt{3}}}{\dfrac{\sqrt{3}}{2}} &  &  & = & \dfrac{\dfrac{5}{2\sqrt{3}}}{\dfrac{\sqrt{3}}{2}}\\
 & = & \dfrac{10}{3} &  &  & = & \dfrac{5}{3}\\
 & \approx & 3,33 &  &  & \approx & 1,67
\end{array}
\]
\[
\begin{array}{cclcccl}
w'_{A} & = & \dfrac{w_{C}-\beta x_{B}}{\sqrt{1-\beta^{2}}} & \qquad & x_{B} & = & \dfrac{x'_{B}+\beta w'_{B}}{\sqrt{1-\beta^{2}}}\\
w'_{A} & = & \gamma\left(w_{C}-\beta x_{B}\right) &  & x_{B} & = & \gamma\left(x'_{B}+\beta w'_{A}\right)\\
w_{C} & = & \dfrac{w'_{A}}{\gamma}+\beta x_{B} &  & x'_{B} & = & \dfrac{x_{B}}{\gamma}-\beta w'_{A}\\
 & = & \dfrac{\dfrac{5}{\sqrt{3}}}{\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}}+\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)\left(4\right) &  &  & = & \dfrac{4}{\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}}-\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)\left(\dfrac{5}{\sqrt{3}}\right)\\
 & = & \dfrac{5}{2}+2 &  &  & = & 2\sqrt{3}-\dfrac{5\sqrt{3}}{6}\\
 & = & \dfrac{9}{2} &  &  & = & \dfrac{7\sqrt{3}}{6}\\
 & = & 4.5 &  &  & \approx & 2,02
\end{array}
\]

Ponto $D$: $x_{C}=x_{B}$ e $w'_{C}=w'_{A}$. Usando as mudanças
de coordenadas 
\[
\begin{array}{cclcccl}
w'_{C} & = & \gamma\left(w_{C}-\beta x_{C}\right) &  & w'_{D} & = & \gamma\left(w_{D}-\beta x_{D}\right)\\
w_{C} & = & \dfrac{w'_{C}}{\gamma}+\beta x_{C} &  & w_{D} & = & \dfrac{w'_{D}}{\gamma}+\beta x_{D}\\
 & = & \dfrac{w'_{A}}{\gamma}+\beta x_{B} &  &  & = & \dfrac{w'_{B}}{\gamma}+\beta x_{A}\\
 & = & \dfrac{\dfrac{5}{\sqrt{3}}}{\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}}+\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)\left(4\right) &  &  & = & \dfrac{\dfrac{4}{\sqrt{3}}}{\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}}+\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)\left(3\right)\\
 & = & \dfrac{5}{2}+2 &  &  & = & \dfrac{4}{2}+\dfrac{3}{2}\\
 & = & \dfrac{9}{2} &  &  & = & \dfrac{7}{2}\\
 & = & 4.5 &  &  & = & 3.5
\end{array}
\]

Determinando os valores no sistema $S$:
\[
\begin{array}{cclcccl}
w'_{C} & = & \gamma\left(w_{C}-\beta x_{C}\right) &  & w'_{D} & = & \gamma\left(w_{D}-\beta x_{D}\right)\\
w_{C} & = & \dfrac{w'_{C}}{\gamma}+\beta x_{C} &  & w_{D} & = & \dfrac{w'_{D}}{\gamma}+\beta x_{D}\\
 & = & \dfrac{w'_{A}}{\gamma}+\beta x_{B} &  &  & = & \dfrac{w'_{B}}{\gamma}+\beta x_{A}\\
 & = & \dfrac{\dfrac{5}{\sqrt{3}}}{\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}}+\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)\left(4\right) &  &  & = & \dfrac{\dfrac{4}{\sqrt{3}}}{\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}}+\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)\left(3\right)\\
 & = & \dfrac{5}{2}+2 &  &  & = & \dfrac{4}{2}+\dfrac{3}{2}\\
 & = & \dfrac{9}{2} &  &  & = & \dfrac{7}{2}\\
 & = & 4.5 &  &  & = & 3.5
\end{array}
\]

As coordenadas do ponto são
\[
\begin{array}{cclcccl}
E_{C} & = & \left(x_{B},\,w{}_{C}\right) &  & E_{D} & = & \left(x_{A},\,w'_{D}\right)\\
 & = & \left(4,\,\dfrac{3}{2}\right) &  &  & = & \left(3,\,\dfrac{7}{2}\right)
\end{array}
\]
mudando para o sistema de coordenadas S
\[
\begin{array}{cclcccl}
w_{C} & = & \gamma\left(w'_{C}+\beta x_{C}\right) &  & E_{D} & = & \left(x_{A},\,w'_{D}\right)\\
 & = & \dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\left[\dfrac{9}{2}+\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)(4)\right] &  &  & = & \left(x_{D},\,w'_{D}\right)\\
 & = & \dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\left(\dfrac{9}{2}+2\right)\\
 & = & \left(\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\right)\left(\dfrac{13}{2}\right)\\
 & = & \dfrac{13}{\sqrt{3}}\\
\\\\\end{array}
\]
Mudança no tempo:
\[
\begin{array}{cclcccl}
Ax' & = & \gamma\left(x_{A}-\beta w_{A}\right) &  & Aw' & = & \gamma\left(w_{A}-\beta x_{A}\right)\\
 & = & \dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\left[\dfrac{12}{5}-\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)(2)\right] &  &  & = & \dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\left[2-\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)(\dfrac{12}{5})\right]\\
 & = & \dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\left(\dfrac{12}{5}-1\right) &  &  & = & \dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\left(2-\dfrac{6}{5}\right)\\
 & = & \left(\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\right)\left(\dfrac{7}{5}\right) &  &  & = & \left(\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\right)\left(\dfrac{10-6}{5}\right)\\
 & = & \dfrac{14}{5\sqrt{3}} &  &  & = & \dfrac{8}{5\sqrt{3}}\\
 & \approx & 1,61 &  &  & \approx & 0,92\\
\\\end{array}
\]

\[
\begin{array}{cclcccl}
Bx' & = & \gamma\left(x_{B}-\beta w_{B}\right) &  & Bw' & = & \gamma\left(w_{B}-\beta x_{B}\right)\\
 & = & \dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\left[\dfrac{12}{5}-\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)(3)\right] &  &  & = & \dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\left[3-\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)(\dfrac{12}{5})\right]\\
 & = & \dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\left(\dfrac{12}{5}-\dfrac{3}{2}\right) &  &  & = & \dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\left(3-\dfrac{6}{5}\right)\\
 & = & \left(\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\right)\left(\dfrac{24-15}{10}\right) &  &  & = & \left(\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\right)\left(\dfrac{15-6}{5}\right)\\
 & = & \dfrac{9}{5\sqrt{3}} &  &  & = & \dfrac{18}{5\sqrt{3}}\\
 & \approx & 1,04 &  &  & \approx & 2,08\\
\\\end{array}
\]

Representação do ponto E'A em S:
\[
\begin{array}{cclcccl}
\left(Ax'\right)_{x} & = & \gamma\left(Ax'_{x}+\beta\cancelto{0}{\left(Ax'_{w}\right)}\right) & \qquad & \left(Ax'\right)_{w} & = & \gamma\left(\cancelto{0}{\left(Ax'_{w}\right)}+\beta\left(Ax'_{x}\right)\right)\\
 & = & \left(\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\right)\left(\dfrac{14}{5\sqrt{3}}\right) &  &  & = & \left(\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\right)\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)\left(\dfrac{14}{5\sqrt{3}}\right)\\
 & = & \dfrac{28}{15} &  &  & = & \dfrac{14}{15}\\
 & \approx & 1,86 &  &  & \approx & 0,933\\
\\\end{array}
\]

\[
\begin{array}{cclcccl}
\left(Aw'\right)_{x} & = & \gamma\left(\cancelto{0}{Aw'_{x}}+\beta\left(Aw'_{w}\right)\right) & \qquad & \left(Aw'_{x}\right)_{w} & = & \gamma\left(\cancelto{0}{Aw'_{w}}+\beta\left(Aw'_{x}\right)\right)\\
 & = & \left(\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\right)\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)\left(\dfrac{8}{5\sqrt{3}}\right) &  &  & = & \left(\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\right)\left(\dfrac{8}{5\sqrt{3}}\right)\\
 & = & \dfrac{16}{15} &  &  & = & \dfrac{8}{15}\\
 & \approx & 1,07 &  &  & \approx & 0,53\\
\\\end{array}
\]
Representação do ponto E'B em S:
\[
\begin{array}{cclcccl}
\left(Bx'\right)_{x} & = & \gamma\left(Bx'_{x}+\beta\cancelto{0}{\left(Bx'_{w}\right)}\right) & \qquad & \left(Bx'\right)_{w} & = & \gamma\left(\cancelto{0}{Bx'_{w}}+\beta\left(Bx'_{x}\right)\right)\\
 & = & \left(\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\right)\left(\dfrac{9}{5\sqrt{3}}\right) &  &  & = & \left(\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\right)\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)\left(\dfrac{9}{5\sqrt{3}}\right)\\
 & = & \dfrac{18}{15} &  &  & = & \dfrac{9}{15}\\
 & = & 1,2 &  &  & \approx & 0,6\\
\\\end{array}
\]

\[
\begin{array}{cclcccl}
\left(Bw'\right)_{x} & = & \gamma\left(\cancelto{0}{Bw'_{x}}+\beta\left(Bw'_{w}\right)\right) & \qquad & \left(Bw'\right)_{w} & = & \gamma\left(Bw'_{w}+\beta\cancelto{0}{\left(Bw'_{x}\right)}\right)\\
 & = & \left(\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\right)\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)\left(\dfrac{18}{5\sqrt{3}}\right) &  &  & = & \left(\dfrac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\right)\left(\dfrac{18}{5\sqrt{3}}\right)\\
 & = & \dfrac{18}{15} &  &  & = & \dfrac{36}{15}\\
 & = & 1,2 &  &  & \approx & 2,4\\
\\\end{array}
\]
 
\[
\begin{array}{cclcccl}
x'_{C} & = & \gamma\left(x_{C}-\beta w{}_{C}\right) &  & x'_{D} & = & \gamma\left(x_{D}-\beta w{}_{D}\right)\\
x'_{A} & = & \gamma\left(x_{C}-\beta w{}_{B}\right) &  & x'_{B} & = & \gamma\left(x_{D}-\beta w{}_{A}\right)\\
x_{C} & = & \dfrac{1}{\gamma}x'_{A}+\beta w_{B} & \qquad & x_{D} & = & \dfrac{1}{\gamma}x'_{B}+\beta w_{A}\\
 & = & \dfrac{\sqrt{3}}{2}\left(\dfrac{14}{5\sqrt{3}}\right)+\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)\left(3\right) &  &  & = & \dfrac{\sqrt{3}}{2}\left(\dfrac{9}{5\sqrt{3}}\right)+\left(\dfrac{1}{2}\right)\left(2\right)\\
 & = & \dfrac{14+15}{10} &  &  & = & \dfrac{9+10}{10}\\
 & = & \dfrac{29}{10} &  &  & = & \dfrac{19}{10}\\
 & = & 2,9 &  &  & = & 1,9
\end{array}
\]

\begin{tabular}{|c|c|c|c|}
\hline 
Ponto/Projeção & Notação sugerida & Sistema que define o eixo & Coordenadas expressas em\tabularnewline
\hline 
\hline 
Projeção sobre $x$ & $P_{x}^{(x)}$ & S & S\tabularnewline
\hline 
Projeção sobre $w$ & $P_{A}^{(w)}$ & S & S\tabularnewline
\hline 
Projeção sobre $x\prime$ & $P_{A}^{(x')}$ & S' & transformada para S\tabularnewline
\hline 
Projeção sobre $w\prime$ & $P_{A}^{(w')}$ & S' & transformada para S\tabularnewline
\hline 
\end{tabular}

\[
\begin{array}{cclcccl}
\beta & = & \dfrac{3\times10^{7}}{3\times10^{8}} &  & \gamma & = & \dfrac{1}{\sqrt{1-\left(\dfrac{1}{10}\right)^{2}}}\\
 & = & \dfrac{1}{10} &  &  & = & \dfrac{10}{\sqrt{99}}\\
 &  &  &  &  & \approx & 1,005\\
\\\\\\\\\end{array}
\]

\[
\begin{array}{cclcccl}
x' & = & \gamma\left(x-\beta w\right) &  & w' & = & \gamma\left(w-\beta x\right)\\
0 & = & \dfrac{10}{\sqrt{99}}\left(30-\beta w\right) &  &  & = & \dfrac{10}{\sqrt{99}}\left[\left(1\times10^{-6}\right)\left(3\times10^{8}\right)-\left(\dfrac{1}{10}\right)\left(30\right)\right]\\
\beta & = & \dfrac{30}{\left(1\times10^{-6}\right)c} &  &  & = & \dfrac{10}{\sqrt{99}}\left(300-3\right)\\
 & = & \dfrac{3\times10^{7}}{3\times10^{8}} &  &  & = & \dfrac{2970}{\sqrt{99}}\\
 & = & \dfrac{1}{10} &  & t' & = & \dfrac{2970}{c\sqrt{99}}\\
 &  &  &  &  & \approx & 0,995\,\mu s\\
\\\end{array}
\]

\end{document}
